source.sqlReaderQuery:
select max(WatermarkValue) as OldWatermarkvalue from dbo.watermarktable
where TableName = 'stg.cinema_tickets'
select max(TransactionDt) as NewWatermarkvalue from dbo.Tickets

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from dbo.Tickets  where TransactionDt > '@{activity('OldWatermark').output.firstRow.OldWatermarkvalue}' and TransactionDt <= '@{activity('NewWatermark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
TRUNCATE TABLE [stg].[ratings]
    TRUNCATE TABLE [stg].[movies_metadata]
    TRUNCATE TABLE [stg].[credits]
select 1
select max(LastModifiedDate) as FromDateTime, GETUTCDATE() as ToDateTime from dbo.watermarkcopy

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    tMovies.MovieIdNK,
    tMovies.Title,
    tMovies.ReleaseDate,
    tMovies.Runtime,
    tMovieStatus.MovieStatusName as MovieStatus,
    GETDATE() AS CreatedDate,
    GETDATE() AS ModifiedDate
FROM 
    dbo.tMovies
JOIN 
    dbo.tMovieStatus ON tMovies.MovieStatusId = tMovieStatus.MovieStatusId
